name: Blade II
description:
Blade II is an action game developed by Mucky Foot Productions. It came out on 03-09-2002. Activision Blizzard published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Blade II is available on PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
It was produced by Marcus Iremonger. It was directed by Mike Diskett. Martin Oliver scored the game.
